title: Banner of mother Egypt sacrificing her children
description: Photographer's description: Pictures taken during the Egyptian Revolution. Text in image: خبر عاجل- أم مصرية تضحى بابناءها مقابل اقالة الرئيس واسقاط النظام لفاسد و مبارك يضحى  بشعب مصر مقابل كبريائه. Translation of Text in image: Breaking news- An Egyptian mother sacrifices her children for the ousting of the president and Mubārak is sacrificing the Egyptian people for his pride.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Protest movements; Revolutions; Victims of state-sponsored terrorism
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Banner of mother Egypt sacrificing her children
